title: 01/12/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/12/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Albert Breer about the Giants decision to fire Joe Judge. Why did they decide to do it after Black Monday? Dan Orlovsky calls in to share his love for Joe Burrow and why he thinks he 's the best young QB in the game. And was Fritzy trying to insult Dan Le Batard or was it an honest mistake?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
